__e: I mean, even though I've thought these things, and... wondered about all this stuff for so long, it just... doesn't seem possible.
What is he, that... stands across from a man after killing two other men within 36 hours... And when asked of his involvement, cannot only lie, but lie well?
So, when you had said earlier that someone had asked me an important question, what did you mean?
Actually, I should have asked you this a long time ago.
I don't know. If you'd asked me a year ago, I might have said no, never, I'm a career man.
If I didn't have it, it wouldn't be me, and I wouldn't ask this question, which I'm not doing actually, you are.
He's been asking for you all morning.
Look, if it was Mom, you know she would have asked for you.
You know who's been asking about you every time she meets me?
Three months ago, I would have asked you why you didn't tell her?
I want to know why you are asking questions about men that are no longer with us.
I'm glad you asked for me, but I wanted you to know that I'd have come in any event.
And, believe me, I would never have asked you if I didn't think you could do it.
Maybe I should have asked you why you did what you did before yelling at you.
I've been asking myself what I could've done differently, if I could've done anything better.
Okay, you could have come to me and asked me if he was capable of being involved with something like that, of knowing anyone like that.
If you're asking if your mother was the love of my life, then, no, she wasn't.
And I can't even imagine what you would have said... if I'd asked you to let me stay out till 4:00 in the morning.
Shouldn't you have asked before taking such a big decision?
You should have asked me before you said I would.
Maybe I should have asked you this before, but you've done this, right?
